actionCalls.description:
Activates an order and create an Order Summary completing a checkout.
This may fallback to asynchronous mode even if it's marked synchronous, so we'll need to make sure there is logic to handle that case.
actionCalls.name: Activate_Order
actionCalls.label: Activate Order

actionCalls.description: This will cancel active checkouts. This helps create a secure and consistent checkout experience. Allowing multiple tabs to do checkout at the same time but on different steps could lead to unexpected and unreliable behavior. There would be a possibility of abuse by a bad actor. This prevents that.
actionCalls.name: Cancel_Checkouts
actionCalls.label: Cancel Checkouts

actionCalls.description:
Creates an order from a cart. Still requires activation of the cart to complete checkout.
This may fallback to asynchronous mode even if it's marked synchronous, so we'll need to make sure there is logic to handle that case.
actionCalls.name: Cart_to_Order
actionCalls.label: Cart to Order

actionCalls.name: Create_Training_Session_Records_and_Send_Email
actionCalls.label: Create Training Session Records and Send Email

actionCalls.description: Creates a new checkout session and gives it an initial state. This also updates the cart's status to be 'Checkout'.
actionCalls.name: Start_Checkout_Session
actionCalls.label: Start Checkout Session

actionCalls.description: Adds taxes to the cart. This calls a custom inventory invocable action that should be further customized.
actionCalls.name: Taxes
actionCalls.label: Taxes

assignments.description: This node is here for cosmetic purposes. It helps make the flow easier to read, but is not a necessary technical component.
assignments.name: Beatification_No_Logic2
assignments.label: Beatification - No Logic

assignments.description: cartToOrder was designed to be run asynchronously and expects a "Next State". Without a next state, cartToOrder assumes a failure, so we provide when even though it's not necessary for the rest of the flow.
assignments.name: Update_Next_State_to_ActivateOrder
assignments.label: Update Next State to ActivateOrder

assignments.description: cartToOrder was designed to be run asynchronously and expects a "Next State". Without a next state, cartToOrder assumes a failure, so we provide when even though it's not necessary for the rest of the flow.
assignments.name: Update_Next_State_to_Authorize_Payment
assignments.label: Update Next State to Authorize Payment

decisions.description:
If the cart is already closed then the cart has already been converted to an order. If that's the case, show the buyer the Order Confirmation page.
There's more smarts that could be here by adding other outcomes of the status. For instance, if the webCart status is: * 'Checkout': We probably need to cancel a checkout session * 'Active': We could likely skip canceling the checkout, saving a small amount of time and resources
decisions.name: Is_Cart_Already_Complete
decisions.label: Is Cart Already Complete

decisions.description: Ensures that if the buyer starts a second checkout that we don't attempt to progress this duplicate checkout.
decisions.name: Is_Session_Still_Valid_After_Delivery
decisions.label: Is Session Still Valid After Delivery?

decisions.description: Ensures that if the buyer starts a second checkout that we don't attempt to progress this duplicate checkout.
decisions.name: Is_Session_Still_Valid_After_Payment
decisions.label: Is Session Still Valid After Payment?

decisions.description: Ensures that if the buyer starts a second checkout that we don't attempt to progress this duplicate checkout.
decisions.name: Is_Session_Still_Valid_After_Shipping
decisions.label: Is Session Still Valid After Shipping?

decisions.description: Ensures that if the buyer starts a second checkout that we don't attempt to progress this duplicate checkout.
decisions.name: Is_Session_Still_Valid_After_Summary
decisions.label: Is Session Still Valid After Summary?

decisions.description: No sense updating a delivery method that hasn't changed from the default suggestion.
decisions.name: Update_Delivery_Method_If_Changed
decisions.label: Update Delivery Method if Changed

Flow.description: ACO - Include Expertise Check 11/08/2021 GDH - added Payment Method 17/08/21 ACO - New Screens for Influence and Expertises 18/08/21 ACO - Updates for Order Delivery Method 24/08/2021 ACO - Add Billing Info 2/9/2021 KMM - Removing Order Delivery Method 7/10/2021 VMO - Modified "UpdateOrder" Subflow to include update of lookup field on Cart on the Order record 7/10/2021 VMO - Modified "Update Order If Influenced" as field Influenced Order is a chekbox but the Subflow assigned it a value of "Not Recognized" 10/8/2021 KMM - Remove Shipping Options 18/10/2021 VMO - Called apex class B2B_OrderConfirmationEmail if no errors on order 20/10/2021 KMM - AddConnected Email Address 21/10/2021 GDH - Removed Payment authorization since payment already made in lwc 03/11/2021 KMM - Sepa Payment was modified to handle new an existing one 03/11/2021 KMM - Store Id 17/11/2021 GDH - Remove Summary screen 17/11/2021 KMM - Order Fields 17/11/2021 GDH - Translate Next & previous buttons for payment screen 08/12/2022 ASE - Translate Expertise Screen
Flow.label: B2B Checkout

recordLookups.description: Cart Status is used to ensure the cart exists and if the cart is already complete, then forward buyer to the Order Confirmation page.
recordLookups.name: Get_Cart_Status
recordLookups.label: Get Cart Status

recordLookups.description: After each screen, we need to ensure the session is still active. If the buyer started a new checkout, this tab might still be active but the session is archived. We want to terminate if that's the case.
recordLookups.name: Get_Checkout_Session_After_Payment
recordLookups.label: Get Checkout Session After Payment

recordLookups.description: After each screen, we need to ensure the session is still active. If the buyer started a new checkout, this tab might still be active but the session is archived. We want to terminate if that's the case.
recordLookups.name: Get_Checkout_Session_After_Summary
recordLookups.label: Get Checkout Session After Summary

recordLookups.description: Get the non-archived session. Only one session will be non-archived at a time, and since we know we have a completed cart, this session is the session that was used to complete the checkout.
recordLookups.name: Get_Completed_Session
recordLookups.label: Get Completed Session

recordLookups.description: Get the Contact Point Address that the buyer selected as their shipping address.
recordLookups.name: Get_Contact_Point_Address
recordLookups.label: Get Contact Point Address

recordLookups.description: The checkout session contains a foreign key to the order, which we'll use to get the order summary Id.
recordLookups.name: Get_Final_Checkout_Session
recordLookups.label: Get Final Checkout Session

recordLookups.description: On the Order Confirmation, we show data from the Order Summary. This gets the order summary id.
recordLookups.name: Get_Order_Summary
recordLookups.label: Get Order Summary

recordLookups.description: After each screen, we need to ensure the session is still active. If the buyer started a new checkout, this tab might still be active but the session is archived. We want to terminate if that's the case.
recordLookups.name: Get_Session_After_Delivery
recordLookups.label: Get Session After Delivery

recordLookups.description: After each screen, we need to ensure the session is still active. If the buyer started a new checkout, this tab might still be active but the session is archived. We want to terminate if that's the case.
recordLookups.name: Get_Session_After_Shipping
recordLookups.label: Get Session After Shipping

recordUpdates.description: Copies the contact point address fields into the CartDeliveryGroup. Also, adds the shipping instructions.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Cart_Delivery_Group_Address
recordUpdates.label: Update Cart Delivery Group's Address

fields.name: BillingInfos
fields.fieldText:
Pour rappel, l'adresse de facturation est :

{!Get_Account_Info.BillingStreet}

{!Get_Account_Info.BillingPostalCode} {!Get_Account_Info.BillingCity}

{!Get_Account_Info.BillingCountry}


Vous recevrez la confirmation de commande à l'adresse mail : {!ConnectedUserEmail}

fields.name: ThankYou
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your Order.

Was this purchase recommended to you by your sales contact(s)? (Click Continue to say Yes)

screens.name: Wait_if_Activate_Order_reverts_Async
screens.label: Wait if Activate Order reverts Async

screens.name: Wait_If_Cart_To_Order_reverts_Async
screens.label: Wait If Cart To Order reverts Async

subflows.description: Shows the fault message. Same as other error subflows that show fault message (though copied to make the flow look nicer).
subflows.name: Error
subflows.label: Error

subflows.description: Shows the fault message. Same as other error subflows that show fault message (though copied to make the flow look nicer).
subflows.name: Error_3
subflows.label: Error

value.stringValue: Looks like you don't have an activat CartCheckoutSession. Do you have a checkout running in another tab?

subflows.description: This error subflow catches the cases where the built in cartToOrder/activateOrder marked the session as having had an error.
subflows.name: Session_had_an_Error
subflows.label: Session had an Error

variables.description: Used to put error messages in for the error subflow
variables.name: errorMessage
